website_summaries.verdict: Highly rated, pure cotton 2-pack set of yoga straps at an unbeatable price.
pros: Set of 2, 8-foot yoga straps that are sturdy and substantially thick
Plain white cotton has an authentic, zen appeal
Strength of D-ring buckle approved by yoga teachers and physical therapists
Made from high quality, reinforced cotton that’s soft to the touch
cons: Only comes in one length, so may be too short or long for people depending on height or flexibility
White cotton may get soiled after extended use

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality Than Others I've Seen Here at a Similar Price
customer_reviews.text: That's important, if you plan on giving your yoga straps a regular, vigorous workout. Another plus for, as a person who appreciates minimalism and simplicity, is the plain white color. I don't go for all the bright colors of many similar products. Who are we trying to impress? Yoga is for practice, not for external appearances, and as such, external distractions such as focusing on popular styles, are in opposition to the philosophy behind yoga's practice, which is about getting beyond identification with the changing, impermanent nature of such externals. These are simply functional and well made. For the practice of authentic yoga, that is all that should be required.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bailey

customer_reviews.title: SPORTS THERAPY
customer_reviews.text: As a sports performance physical therapist, I use straps and many similar products to these to assist with mobility exercises and manual treatments with my patients and clients. These straps are well-made and durable, which is important given how often we use them each day. The grip is good and the D-rings are really strong so we can pull on them hard when we need to. I've tested them out plenty. Great product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Arth

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: These yoga straps are nice. They are certainly long enough for my 5'2: frame What I like about the color, even though they may look dirtier with use than a prettier darker color, is that I printed my name in the one I'm taking to the gym with a Sharpie Marker. I've lost a couple of Yoga straps in the past, hence the reason I bought these. Now there's a chance I'll get them back if left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Joyce

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS SERVICE. FABULOUS DEAL.
customer_reviews.text: The straps came right away. They are nice and long...specially designed for inflexible people. I was surprised by the thickness and quality, given the price. The packaging was really nice (2 per bag). The extra bonus was the personal touch of a pdf that was emailed to me, showing various ways to use the strap. I bought a few of the straps for my students. I will probably go back and get a few more.
customer_reviews.author: VEGAN YOGINI

customer_reviews.title: Great straps!
customer_reviews.text: Great straps !! We needed to replace our straps for our small studio that was devastated in Hurricane Irma. These arrived on time and were brought to our island by a friend. They are now in good use helping our students release a ton of tension and on our way to healing some very tired muscles !! Thank you !!! Just bought another batch great quality .. great price !!!
customer_reviews.author: Soulunar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality and unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'8 male (about 180 lbs). I use these for rehab and stretching mainly, but I've let friends use them for yoga. So far, they're perfect. Pros: -Material is a nice canvasy feel that isn't too slippery and yet won't give you rope burn -D-rings seem well-attached and haven't rusted yet after several months of heavy use. -Great length and width for me (5'8) -Cost makes them a no-brainer to try Cons: -Only comes in white. With frequent gym use, that quickly turns into not white!
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised, inexpensive, and received promptly. One thing missing from the ad that buyers would want to know is the width of the strap: 1.5 inches, or about 38 mm. Another hint for buyers: these straps are 8 feet long, and you don't want them any less. Six-foot lengths are available, but you'll find that you need the extra slack for a lot of routines.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Got way more than I paid for, for once
customer_reviews.text: If it's wrong to love a yoga strap, then I don't want to be right. I often buy props from my studio, but the straps they offer are too thick and heavy, in colors I'm not crazy about. Based on the good reviews, I decided to take a chance on these, figuring I'd likely return them since they were so inexpensive. Surely, I thought, either I'd find some fatal flaw, or the good reviews were bogus. But wow, these are perfect in every way! Well made (sturdy without being too heavy or overlarge; good hardware); perfect size/length/color; easy to use; soft on the hands and feet. Believe the reviews, and buy 'em! Perhaps you, too, will fall in love.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hill

customer_reviews.title: “ The yoga belt that I received was exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: “ The yoga belt that I received was exactly what I was looking for. I've used one previously and just could not find one until I went on Amazon. I just wished it was a dark color since I tend to go barefoot when using it. "
customer_reviews.author: esc

customer_reviews.title: Like these straps
customer_reviews.text: These straps were delivered on time. The packaging was good. And the straps are as advertised. I've used them for a while and really like them. I had some other straps that were slippery. But, these are easy to grip. You also get a delivery confirmation email that has a pdf hidden at the bottom. The pdf is a nicely done description in photos of ways to use the straps. I would buy the straps again. Just haven't used them enough to give this a 5. But, they are close.
customer_reviews.author: rbar

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good length (8’ rather than some that are only 6’), sturdy, comfortable and quick shipping. Also, got 2 straps for the same price as most charge for just one, this allowed me to give one to another member of my family.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Should last a long long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to gift to a yoga teacher who was providing yoga classes to teens in a foster care group home. She loved them and it helped provide for the kids needs. They are sturdy enough to last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Buy these right now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a yoga teacher, and I purchased 15 of these straps. They are amazing, especially considering the super low price! If you're on the fence or wondering why these are so cheap compared to many others available on Amazon, go ahead and buy them; I'm guessing you'll be as impressed by the quality as I was. I believe these straps will last me and my students through years of classes and frequent use, and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why they don't seem to make some like this instead of putting buckles on all of them
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Straps are long enough to allow me to remove the buckle on one and sew end into a loop. Don't know why they don't seem to make some like this instead of putting buckles on all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nanj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: These straps are an incredible value - we bought two of the 5 packs for the yoga studio space at the hospital where I work. Nothing fancy but very sturdy and exactly what we needed for our beginner to experienced beginner classes. Straps are excellent for any level of yoga experience, allowing you to experiment safely with new poses, explore known poses in new ways, or to assist those with limited range of movement and give them access to poses they might not be able to do at all otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Glass

customer_reviews.title: I don’t usually write comment!  I’m So happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worry about belts quality since it was very reasonable price! But they surprised me I’m really good way!!! I love it!!! I will purchase more belt since I need more belts!!! Thank you Pete’s choice!!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Price and durability.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my doctor ordered for my physical therapy, only thing is I can’t find where the link is for your Bonus book. Thank you I’ve ordered a couple of more for extra help.
customer_reviews.author: oldguy

customer_reviews.title: Its a strap!
customer_reviews.text: The strap, first made famous by the Spanish during the inquisition and later by slave owners as a motivational tool has evolved into a more pleasant device to help with yoga and well-being. Don't buy the fancy leather straps, this is all you need for your yoga practice. I have also used them to hold together wood projects for gluing. Either use you can't beat the price for a sturdy fabric strap.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Orner

customer_reviews.title: Will last for years
customer_reviews.text: These hold up to very strong use. And bc it comes in a 2 pack I gave my mom the other one! Sharing is caring for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: markerlover

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft durable yoga straps
customer_reviews.text: Great straps. They are cotton and very soft but sturdy. I teach yoga and have a quantity of items I take with me for my classes, including these straps. My students really like them and I have provided this link a few times when students wanted to buy their own. I liked the ebook you get with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: These things are great
customer_reviews.text: These things are taking my practice to a whole new level. They help me achieve different stretches and poses that I definitely couldn't do before the straps. I have been able to make leaps and bounds, results that I hadn't seen since the beginning of my practice. I would say these were a need for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bec E.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 15 of these in the last year for classes
customer_reviews.text: Wife is a yoga instructor and instructs paid classes and free community classes. She liked these so much we just keep ordering more. Great straps all around, great quality and price is right.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Straps
customer_reviews.text: These straps are sturdy and well made. I am used to shorter 6 ft. straps, but since I teach yoga to several large men, I decided to go with the 8 ft. straps. I needed about 10 straps, so two of these packs did the trick! Good price, good value.
customer_reviews.author: ksueshoe

customer_reviews.title: Good for chair yoga
customer_reviews.text: I go to a chair yoga we use straps in our class. Theses straps are reasonably priced, sturdy and a good length. One of the women in my class asked me to order a set for her because she liked mine. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Darleen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, thick straps and the metal buckle won’t ever snap like plastic. Pleased with the purchase

customer_reviews.title: Your typical yoga strap aka good
customer_reviews.text: The product is your typical yoga strap. It is white which leads to concerns of getting dirty easily, but on the bright side, you could wash with other white with Clorox if you don't care for the stitched-in logo. I cannot comment on durability because I just received the product. Overal content with purchase and would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: As described. Good quality...great value for the price. I’m just starting yoga so maybe my frame of reference is not as astute as a veteran yogi, but these blocks work well for my purposes and I’m happy with this purpose.

The package arrived quickly and as indicated. I'm very pleased with my purchase and excited for how it will deepen the practice for my students.

customer_reviews.title: They work great as yoga straps.

product_meta.title: pete's choice 2-Pack or 5-Pack Yoga Exercise Adjustable Straps 8Ft | Bonus eBook | with Durable D-Ring for Pilates & Gym Workouts | Hold Poses, Stretch, Improve Flexibility & Maintain Balance
feature_bullets: IMPROVE BALANCE & FLEXIBILITY: Looking for safe yet highly effective ways to enhance your flexibility and align your spine? Search no more! Enjoy better stances, greater poses and perfect balance with Pete’s Choice straps.

DISCOVER THEIR MULTIPURPOSE ROLE: No matter the pose, experience or intensity, these belt straps are here to facilitate your Yoga sessions. Ideal for Yoga, Pilates, daily exercises, gym class, physical therapy and outdoors.

CONFORMS TO YOUR NEEDS: This strap is made of high quality thick and reinforced cotton and has an adjustable D-ring. Ensure a non-slip grip without tiring your hands. Each strap measures 8ft long, is lightweight and easy to carry!

WORKS FOR ALL SHAPES & SIZES: Our Yoga straps are suitable for men, women and kids. They are strong enough to withstand great pressure and any Yoga pose possible. Work perfectly for over the mat stances or standing ones.

GET THIS YOGA STRAP SET RISK FREE: Since your satisfaction is our top priority, this Yoga strap set is backed by our lifetime money back guarantee policy. The set includes 2 beige Yoga straps and a bonus eBook with more than 10 poses.
